name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced Tab Manager - Control Your Web Experience

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to manage tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your tabs and sessions effortlessly with powerful features designed to keep your browser organized and efficient. 

Key Features: Save, label, restore, and delete your browsing sessions with ease. Close, mute, and merge tabs with a single click.

Note: This extension uses affiliate links. When you make purchases through certain links on Amazon, we may earn a small commission at no extra cost to you. This helps support the development and maintenance of the extension. You will be prompted for consent before using
